name: Cheese cake is prohibit!
description:
If you are using mobile , browsing with PC mode is recommended.

  • Outline

We are making stew with friends.

But one of friends tries to put cheese cakes in the stew!

Move player and catch the cheese cakes before dropped in the stew!

  • How to operate

Arrow keys on your keyboard or on the screen: player moves right and left.

The friend drops cheese cake. 

 So you have to catch the cheese cake before dropped in the stew.

If 5 cheese cakes are dropped in stew, game is over.

When other ingredients are dropped in stew, you get points.

So you should not catch other ingredients.

But when you catch garlic, the friend become slow for a while.

So you should catch garlic.
